text: John Durnin (born 10 November 1894) was a Scottish footballer who played for Partick Thistle and Dumbarton. ==References== Category:1894 births Category:Scottish footballers Category:Dumbarton F.C. players Category:Partick Thistle F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:Year of death missing Category:Association football midfielders
title: John Durnin (Scottish footballer)
